member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.WorkItemTracking.Client.WorkItemStore.Query(Microsoft.TeamFoundation.WorkItemTracking.Client.BatchReadParameterCollection,System.String)
member.param: A collection of objects, each specifying a work item ID and an optional revision. If no revision is specified, the latest revision is assumed. The query will return a including the s specified by the IDs and revisions listed in the collection. The order of s included in the return set matches the order of IDs specified in batchReadParams.

A query expression specifying the fields to be paged in the result set. The query must be a work item query language (WIQL) string of the form “SELECT <fields> FROM workitems.” Other clauses such as WHERE are not supported for this method.
